items.sentence: I couldn\'t make myself heard above the noise.
I don\'t think that Tom is going to get fired.
I don\'t think that Tom is trying hard enough.
I don\'t think that Tom knows what Mary wants.
I don\'t think that Tom misses Mary very much.
I don\'t think that Tom wants to sing with us.
Tom and the other hostages have been released.
Tom asked Mary if she thought he was handsome.
Do you think tomorrow\'s weather will be good?
How long did it take you to write this report?
How much money do you have with you right now?
I already feel like things are getting better.
I still don\'t understand what the problem is.
I still haven\'t done what Tom asked me to do.
If I\'m not too busy, I\'ll help you tomorrow.
Mary is even more beautiful than I remembered.
His speech held the attention of the audience.
How long do you think Tom will stay in Boston?
How many teachers does this university employ?
I want you to go to Boston with Tom next week.
I want you to help us find out who killed Tom.
I wanted Tom to go away and leave me in peace.
I wanted Tom to help me clean the living room.
Tom has as much right to be here as Mary does.
I can\'t keep up with you if you walk so fast.
Tom definitely has the ability to be the boss.
Tom definitely seems to be interested in Mary.
Tom loaded the bags into the trunk of his car.
Who\'s your favorite Disney cartoon character?
Why are you glad that that\'s going to happen?
You don\'t really want to eat with us, do you?
My airport shuttle bus leaves at six o\'clock.
Everyone in the room was doing the same thing.
Everyone is expected to bring their own lunch.
Tom isn\'t as crazy as everybody thinks he is.
Tom isn\'t likely be punished for what he did.
Tom isn\'t likely to be in Boston next Monday.
Did you know that peanuts aren\'t really nuts?
I thought I\'d forgotten to close the windows.
I thought you knew Tom couldn\'t speak French.
I\'m the only one here who understands French.
Global climate change is everybody\'s problem.
It would be depressing to do that by yourself.
It would be impossible to do that by yourself.
Be careful not to stand too close to the fire.
Can you see the big white building over there?
Can you tell me exactly what needs to be done?
Why is Tom still standing outside in the rain?
Will feeding my dog garlic cause any problems?
I\'ve been playing soccer since I was fifteen.
